title: [24/96] Scientist - Heavyweight Dub Champion - 1980, Vinyl Rip
description:
Scientist - Heavyweight Dub Champion - 1980

Greensleeves Records - GREL 13, UK

LP, Vinyl Rip, 24/96, FLAC (tracks+.cue)

Rip from the Internet

Side 1

 A1 - Seconds Away
 A2 - Straight Left
 A3 - Upper Cut
 A4 - Kidney Punch
 A5 - Saved By The Bell

Side 2

 B1 - Right Cross
 B2 - Jab
 B3 - One-Two
 B4 - Below The Belt
 B5 - Knock Out 

Companies etc

 Recorded At - Channel One Recording Studio
 Mixed At - King Tubby's Studio

Credits

 Artwork, Cover - Tony McDermott
 Backing Band - Roots Radics Band
 Bass - Errol 'Flabba' Holt
 Drums - Carlton 'Santa' Davis
 Guitar [Lead] - Earl 'Chinna' Smith
 Guitar [Rhythm] - Eric 'Bingy Bunny' Lamont
 Keyboards - Ansel Collins, Gladstone 'Gladdie' Anderson
 Mastered By - Ray Staff
 Mixed By - Scientist
 Percussion - Christopher 'Sky Juice' Blake
 Producer, Arranged By - Henry 'Junjo' Lawes
 Saxophone - Headley Bennett
 Technician [Second & Towels] - Jah Thomas
 Trombone - Val Bennett
 Trumpet - Bobby Ellis

Notes

 All rhythm tracks laid at Channel One Studios
 Mixed at King Tubby's by Scientist
 Mastered by Ray Staff
 Second & towels - Jah Thomas
 Produced & arranged by Henry 'Juno' Lawes

Barcode and Other Identifiers
